snippet.title: The Princess in the Mirror Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming soon to iOS & Android!

From Voltage's famous interactive romance series comes the fairy tale glitz of The Princess in the Mirror!
One day you're a normal secretary, and the next you're dragged into an unfamiliar world!

"We have awaited your coming, Your Highness."

You inherit an old hand-mirror from your grandma,
and it sucks you into a completely different universe.
Not only are you recognized as a princess in this realm, but you're told to pick a spouse!
You're surrounded by nobles, knights, and faithful servants.
But who will you choose?

Follow us on social media for updates:
【Facebook】
https://www.facebook.com/Voltage.SLBP/
【Twitter】
https://twitter.com/MirrPrincess

Official Website:
https://voltageapps.com/
